battlesys
Class RandomEventResult

java.lang.Object
  battlesys.RandomEventResult

public final class RandomEventResult
extends java.lang.Object

Immutable class stores a result of the random event phase

Constructor Summary

Constructor Detail

RandomEventResult

public RandomEventResult(java.lang.String affectPlayer,
                         int affectQuality,
                         int effectValue,
                         int effectRound,
                         java.lang.String resultString)
Constructor setting up the Random Event Result

Parameters:
affectPlayer - Which player is affected. The team number of the player is returned.
affectQuality - What is affected, as specified by Player.AFFECT_HP, Player.AFFECT_ATK etc...
effectValue - The quantity of the effect, i.e. the value of change due to this event. 0 for all players
resultString - The message to show for this event
effectRound - How many rounds do the effect last

RandomEventResult

public RandomEventResult(RandomEventResult r,
                         java.lang.String resultString)
Constructor setting up the Random Event Result from a given result, only with result string replaced.

Parameters:
affectPlayer - Which player is affected. The team number of the player is returned.
affectQuality - What is affected, as specified by Player.AFFECT_HP, Player.AFFECT_ATK etc...
effectValue - The quantity of the effect, i.e. the value of change due to this event. 0 for all players
effectRound - How many rounds do the effect last

Returns:
the affectPlayer, -1 if no random event happened
